original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, votes as v WHERE c.UserId = v.UserId AND c.Score=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E2.UserId)
